nodes.text: Foreman Crusher was the name given to a massive Kintan crusher who guarded the entrance to the droid factory in the palace of the Hutt Cartel leader, Karagga, on the planet Nal Hutta after the end of the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Foreman Crusher was kept chained up by members of Karagga's beast masters. When a group of interlopers stormed the palace, they overwhelmed Foreman Crusher and killed the Kintan crusher.
